trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The homarid can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The homarid makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The homarid has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kavu makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

trait.name: Raking Charge
trait.text: If the kavu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the kavu can make one rend attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 23 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monster.name: Zombie Horse
monster.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
trait.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
